data.name: Into the Nightmare
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/


About the Game

It’s said that a certain tree in the park grants any couple who confesses under it eternal love.

Yatsuha and her lover Shigure visit this tree, only to find themselves suddenly transported to an unknown space and attacked by monsters.

They’re rescued by a gun-toting girl who bears an uncanny resemblance to one of Yatsuha’s missing colleagues, only to find that similar mysterious spaces are popping up around town.

To protect her peaceful city and its inhabitants from the otherworldly monsters known as Mares, Yatsuha must embrace her family’s lineage and fight.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Enemy Weakness System
  • Crafting System

It’s said that a certain tree in the park grants any couple who confesses under it eternal love.

Yatsuha and her lover Shigure visit this tree, only to find themselves suddenly transported to an unknown space and attacked by monsters.

They’re rescued by a gun-toting girl who bears an uncanny resemblance to one of Yatsuha’s missing colleagues, only to find that similar mysterious spaces are popping up around town.

To protect her peaceful city and its inhabitants from the otherworldly monsters known as Mares, Yatsuha must embrace her family’s lineage and fight.

data.short_description: When people around town start getting transported to a mysterious space, Yatsuha must embrace her family's power, and protect the inhabitants of the city.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Into the Nightmare contains strong language.
